about:
QIKPDF is a minimal browser-based PDF tool.
• 100% local processing
• No uploads, no servers
• No file storage
• No tracking
• Fast, private and secure
Your files never leave your device.

tools.imageToPdf:
Create a PDF from images.
• Reorder images
• Preview before export
• Maintain original quality
Simple and fast conversion.
tools.merge:
Combine multiple PDF files.
• Reorder files
• Preview pages
• Merge in chosen order
Create one organized document.
tools.split:
Split a PDF into separate files.
• Extract all pages
• Or define custom ranges
• Preview first & last page
Flexible document separation.
tools.rotate:
Rotate PDF pages.
• 90° left
• 90° right
• 180° flip
Rotation preserved during export.
tools.pdfToImages:
Convert PDF pages to images.
• View all pages
• Select specific pages
• Search by page number
• Preview before export
Extract only what you need.
